Noise-cancelling Echo Buds for $44.99. And the first-ever discount on Sony's new flagship headphones.

This is your chance to score record-low prices on AirPods, Beats, Anker Soundcore, Bose, and Samsung audio products. There are even some impressive deals on open earbuds if that's your cup of tea. We've rounded up all the best Prime Day deals on headphones and earbuds, so you don't have to do the digging yourself. Stay tuned for updates throughout the four-day event.
